column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk province: Authorities say a Chinese man fell from a building and died at 5:45 pm on October 22
column5: near the King’s Palace in Sihanoukville.------The victim was identified as Chen Zhiping
column7: a Chinese national. The victim’s body is currently being kept in the morgue to wait for technical experts to determine the cause of death. ------TNN
